item.title: Maximizing Your SQL Server Investments with Azure Hybrid Benefit
item.description: Migrating and modernizing your SQL Server deployments can be a complex and costly endeavor, but Microsoft’s Azure Hybrid Benefit offers a solution that can help you save significantly on your licensing costs while streamlining your hybrid environment. Azure Hybrid Benefit is a cost-saving offering from Microsoft that allows you to apply your existing Windows Server, SQL Server, and Linux subscriptions to your cloud workloads, unlocking substantial savings. By leveraging this benefit, you can save up to 85% over the standard pay-as-you-go rates, making it a highly attractive option for organizations looking to optimize their IT investments.
